thread.title: Performance Consultant / ASC - Sports Management

title: Performance Consultant / ASC - Sports Management
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Performance Consultant / ASC Posted/Updated: 10-02-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsible for generating all streams of facility revenue within Youth, High School, College, Pro Non Brand, Adult and select Pro/Elite categories.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
